Actions.Name: Get Flow as Admin
Actions.Description: Get the given flow from an environment you have admin access to.

Actions.Name: Modify Flow Owners as Admin
Actions.Description: Modify owners of the given flow created in an environment you have admin access to.

Actions.Name: Create Connection
Actions.Description: Create a connection for the given connector in an environment.

Actions.Name: Create Flow
Actions.Description: Create flow

Actions.Name: Delete Flow
Actions.Description: Delete the given flow in an environment

Actions.Name: Get Connector
Actions.Description: Get the given connector in an environment.

Actions.Name: Get Flow
Actions.Description: Get the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: List Connectors
Actions.Description: Lists all of the connectors available in the given environment. This list will include custom connectors as well as the built-in connectors.

Actions.Name: List Callback URL
Actions.Description: List callback URL for the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: List My Connections
Actions.Description: Lists all your connection available in the given environment.

Actions.Name: List Flow Owners
Actions.Description: List all owners of the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: List Flows as Admin
Actions.Description: List all flows in the given environment you have admin access to.

Actions.Name: List Flow Run-Only Users
Actions.Description: List all run only users of the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: List My Flows
Actions.Description: List all flows you created in the given environment.

Actions.Name: List My Environments
Actions.Description: List the environments you have access to.

Actions.Name: Modify Flow Owners
Actions.Description: Modify owners of the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: Modify Run-Only Users
Actions.Description: Modify run-only users of the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: Resubmit Flow
Actions.Description: Resubmit the given flow run in an environment.

Actions.Name: Turn On Flow
Actions.Description: Start the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: Turn Off Flow
Actions.Description: Stop the given flow in an environment.

Actions.Name: Update Flow
Actions.Description: Update the given flow in an environment.
